testcase.name: runScenario["Fluxo completo de registro de usuário e aluguel de livros", "Fluxo Completo da API DemoQA BookStore"](1)
testcase.system-out: Cenário: Fluxo completo de registro de usuário e aluguel de livros # src/test/resources/features/demoQA-API.feature:10 === INICIANDO CRIAÇÃO DE USUÁRIO === Username gerado: testuser_ae1343ac Password: Test@1234 Request Body: CreateUserRequest(userName=testuser_ae1343ac, password=Test@1234) === CRIANDO USUÁRIO NO CLIENT === 📤 REQUEST: URL: POST https://demoqa.com/Account/v1/User Headers: accept=application/json, Content-Type=application/json Body: CreateUserRequest(userName=testuser_ae1343ac, password=Test@1234) 📥 RESPONSE: Status Code: 201 Response Body: {"userID":"5189cd37-220d-4693-9001-40884c99c224","username":"testuser_ae1343ac","books":[]} Headers: Server=nginx/1.17.10 (Ubuntu) Date=Sun, 28 Sep 2025 16:57:15 GMT Content-Type=application/json; charset=utf-8 Content-Length=91 Connection=keep-alive X-Powered-By=Express ETag=W/"5b-QKNibhJ29Hf8ST1RJ6ttsO+AjyY" === FIM CRIAÇÃO DE USUÁRIO === ✅ Usuário criado com sucesso! 📝 Username: testuser_ae1343ac 🆔 UserID: 5189cd37-220d-4693-9001-40884c99c224 🔐 Password: Test@1234 === FIM CRIAÇÃO DE USUÁRIO === Dado que eu crio um novo usuário com credenciais válidas # com.accenture.demoqa.stepdefinitions.DemoQASteps.criarNovoUsuario() === GERANDO TOKEN DE ACESSO === Username: testuser_ae1343ac Password: Test@1234 Request Body: GenerateTokenRequest(userName=testuser_ae1343ac, password=Test@1234) === GERANDO TOKEN NO CLIENT === 📤 REQUEST: URL: POST https://demoqa.com/Account/v1/GenerateToken Headers: accept=application/json, Content-Type=application/json Body: GenerateTokenRequest(userName=testuser_ae1343ac, password=Test@1234) 📥 RESPONSE: Status Code: 200 Response Body: {"token":"eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VyTmFtZSI6InRlc3R1c2VyX2FlMTM0M2FjIiwicGFzc3dvcmQiOiJUZXN0QDEyMzQiLCJpYXQiOjE3NTkwNzg2MzZ9.ronFF9CZSvcYi7axN5TQfOyETSr6rAWtCpQfD--VH6U","expires":"2025-10-05T16:57:16.225Z","status":"Success","result":"User authorized successfully."} Headers: Server=nginx/1.17.10 (Ubuntu) Date=Sun, 28 Sep 2025 16:57:17 GMT Content-Type=application/json; charset=utf-8 Content-Length=286 Connection=keep-alive X-Powered-By=Express ETag=W/"11e-iv3G1Tn6ENg6atsd6q1/1GxgnvU" === FIM GERAÇÃO DE TOKEN === ✅ Token gerado com sucesso! 📋 Detalhes do usuário: UserID: 5189cd37-220d-4693-9001-40884c99c224 Username: testuser_ae1343ac Quantidade de livros: 0 === FIM VERIFICAÇÃO DE AUTORIZAÇÃO === Então o usuário deve estar autorizado # com.accenture.demoqa.stepdefinitions.DemoQASteps.verificarAutorizacaoUsuario() === RECUPERANDO LISTA DE LIVROS === === RECUPERANDO LIVROS DISPONÍVEIS === 📤 REQUEST: URL: GET https://demoqa.com/BookStore/v1/Books Headers: accept=application/json 📥 RESPONSE: Status Code: 200 Response Body: {"books":[{"isbn":"9781449325862","title":"Git Pocket Guide","subTitle":"A Working Introduction","author":"Richard E.
